Posts.EditableText: Ok, I Wont Argue nomore wether i start something or not, lets just all call a truce, i'd rather be fucusing on my game then arguing on these forums, i think we should all just help each other if needed and to help the community, i've been a jerk, wether its my fault or not...with that said lets do something positive...advertise Quest in Link exchanges?, start a webpage about Quest or Quest Games?...Lets Help Grow this Community, not tear it down...and if i upsetted anyone then i Apoligize.
Posts.HTML: Ok, I Wont Argue nomore wether i start something or not, lets just all call a truce, i'd rather be fucusing on my game then arguing on these forums, i think we should all just help each other if needed and to help the community, i've been a jerk, wether its my fault or not...with that said lets do something positive...advertise Quest in Link exchanges?, start a webpage about Quest or Quest Games?...Lets Help Grow this Community, not tear it down...and if i upsetted anyone then i Apoligize.
